contentType: [integration, reference]
---

# Microsoft Dynamics CRM node

Use the Microsoft Dynamics CRM node to automate work in Microsoft Dynamics CRM, and integrate Microsoft Dynamics CRM with other applications. n8n has built-in support for  creating, updating, deleting, and getting Microsoft Dynamics CRM accounts. 

On this page, you'll find a list of operations the Microsoft Dynamics CRM node supports and links to more resources.

/// note | Credentials
Refer to [Microsoft credentials](/integrations/builtin/credentials/microsoft.md) for guidance on setting up authentication.
///

## Operations

* Account
    * Create
    * Delete
    * Get
    * Get All
    * Update

## Templates and examples

options.description: The legal designation or other business type of the account for contracts or reporting purposes. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: description
options.description: Additional information to describe the account, such as an excerpt from the companyâ€™s website

options.description: The primary email address for the account

options.name: emailaddress3
options.description: Alternate email address for the account

options.name: ftpsiteurl
options.description: URL for the accountâ€™s FTP site to enable users to access data and share documents

options.name: industrycode
options.description: The accountâ€™s primary industry for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: name
options.description: Company o business name

options.name: creditlimit
options.description: Credit limit of the account. This is a useful reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

options.name: numberofemployees
options.description: Number of employees that work at the account for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis

options.name: paymenttermscode
options.description: The payment terms to indicate when the customer needs to pay the total amount. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.displayName: Preferred Appointment Day Name or ID

options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: revenue
options.description: The annual revenue for the account, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis

options.name: sharesoutstanding
options.description: The number of shares available to the public for the account. This number is used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

options.name: shippingmethodcode
options.description: Shipping method for deliveries sent to the accountâ€™s address to designate the preferred carrier or other delivery option. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: sic
options.description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code that indicates the accountâ€™s primary industry of business, for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis

options.name: stockexchange
options.description: The stock exchange at which the account is listed to track their stock and financial performance of the company

options.name: telephone1
options.description: The main phone number for this account

options.name: telephone2
options.description: The second phone number for this account

options.name: telephone3
options.description: The third phone number for this account

options.name: territorycode
options.description: Region or territory for the account for use in segmentation and analysis. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: tickersymbol
options.description: Type the stock exchange symbol for the account to track financial performance of the company. You can click the code entered in this field to access the latest trading information from MSN Money.

options.name: websiteurl
options.description: The accountâ€™s website URL to get quick details about the company profile

options.name: yominame
options.description: The phonetic spelling of the company name, if specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls and other communications
